Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at Comerica Park in Detroit, MI on Sunday, September 1, 2024
The expected starting pitchers will be Cooper Criswell and Ty Madden
Others: The Detroit Tigers (68-67) are welcoming the Boston Red Sox (69-65) at Comerica Park on Sunday.
Boston Red Sox are putting up 4.8 runs per game, which has them sitting at 8th in MLB.
The Red Sox have earned 266 two-baggers as a team and have hit 168 baseballs out of the stadium.
Detroit has accounted for 140 long balls this year as well as 550 RBIs.
The Tigers have a team ERA of 3.78 (504 earned runs yielded) and their staff has struck out 1,140 strikeouts against 358 walks.
